sentences.en: A bad home environment can affect a child's healthy growth.
sentences.cn: 不良的家庭环境能影响儿童的健康成长.

sentences.en: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.cn: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.en: Arthritis is a crippling disease which affects people all over the world.
sentences.cn: 关节炎是一种严重影响健康、困扰全人类的疾病。

sentences.en: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.cn: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.en: Don't let this trifling matter affect our good relationship.
sentences.cn: 别为小事伤了和气.

sentences.en: Even in the artificial environment of an office, our body rhythms continue to affect us.
sentences.cn: 即使是在办公室这样的非自然环境中，我们的人体生物钟依然影响着我们。

sentences.en: How will these changes affect us?
sentences.cn: 这些变化对我们会有什么影响？

sentences.en: I had to make important decisions that would affect me for the rest of my life.
sentences.cn: 我不得不作出将影响我后半生的重大决定。

sentences.en: It doesn't affect my judgement one jot.
sentences.cn: 这丝毫不会影响我的判断。

sentences.en: Poor housing and family stress can affect both physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 住房条件差、家庭压力大会影响身心两方面的健康。

sentences.en: Price changes must not adversely affect the living standards of the people.
sentences.cn: 物价变化一定不能给人们的生活水准带来负面影响。

sentences.en: Scientists call this the "it won't affect me" syndrome.
sentences.cn: 科学家把这种现象称为“我无所谓”的典型表现。

sentences.en: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.cn: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.en: The condition affects one in five women.
sentences.cn: 每五个妇女就有一个人患有这种病。

sentences.en: The contract will affect our national prestige in the world.
sentences.cn: 这一合同将会影响我国的国际声望.

sentences.en: The male menopause is said to affect men who are approaching middle age.
sentences.cn: 据说步入中年的男人会经历男性更年期.

sentences.en: The warming of the Earth and the con-sequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.cn: 地球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响着我们所有人。

sentences.en: They will affect generations of Britons still unborn.
sentences.cn: 他们将会影响还未出世的好几代英国人。

sentences.en: This article will affect my thinking.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章将会影响我的思想.

sentences.en: This will negatively affect the result over the first half of the year.
sentences.cn: 这将对上半年的结果产生不利影响。

sentences.en: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.cn: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.en: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.cn: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

words.tran_cn: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
令人感动地；令人伤心地
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 影响，使感动，（疾病）感染，假装
trans.tran_en: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

trans.tran_cn: 影响， 作用； 感动； 侵袭
trans.tran_en: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation
